name: Muhammad Kashif
title: Frontend & Full-Stack Developer
bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in WordPress, React, and MERN stack. I create modern, responsive web applications with clean code and user-centric design.

services.name: WordPress Development
services.description: Custom WordPress themes and plugins using Bricks Builder and Elementor. I specialize in creating high-performance, SEO-optimized websites tailored to your business needs.

services.name: React Development
services.description: Modern frontend development with React and Next.js. I build responsive, interactive user interfaces with Tailwind CSS and component-driven architecture.

services.name: MERN Stack Development
services.description: Full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. I develop scalable backends and beautiful frontends that work seamlessly together.

experience.description: Building complete web applications from backend to frontend
Creating modern, responsive user interfaces with React and Next.js
Developing custom WordPress sites with advanced customization

faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: I offer WordPress development, React frontend development, and full-stack MERN applications. Each service is tailored to your specific needs.

faqs.question: How long does a project typically take?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, while full-stack applications may take 2-3 months. I'll provide a detailed timeline after discussing your requirements.

faqs.question: Do you work on existing projects?
faqs.answer: Yes! I can help improve, maintain, or extend existing websites and applications. Contact me to discuss your project needs.

faqs.question: What's your development process?
faqs.answer: I follow a collaborative approach: requirement gathering, design mockups, development with regular updates, testing, and deployment. You'll be involved at every stage.
